segments.text: I feel a sense of dread looking at this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is going to slip and fall, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, they're going to tip that stool over and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't watch, it's like a nightmare unfolding before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why doesn't anyone notice what's happening?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel helpless, like I want to shout out and warn them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I know they can't hear me, so I'm stuck just watching in horror.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is giving me the chills, it's so unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I need to look away, I can't stand the suspense.
segments.speaker: PAR
